chara.textHome: There ya are!
Good work, gettin' here in this heat!
Now don't lose your cool, 'kay?

Let's replenish those fluids and salts
before we talk!
Whatcha wanna do today?

Watermelon splitting, beach volleyball,
sand sculptures?
There's tons of fun stuff to do by the sea!

Ah, swimmin' a marathon's
always an option, too!
Sorry to keep ya!

Here, yakisoba, okonomiyaki, and takoyaki.
Plus some fried chicken and kebabs...

Lots of brown stuff like usual,
yeah, but it's all tasty!
Whoa! Look at the sky!
The sun looks so pretty as it sets.

It's the same sun as always,
but somehow it feels special here...
I swam so much today!
Urk...ouch!
Wow, I'm more sunburned than I thought...
Guess I went a little overboard?

I wanna go somewhere summery
with the gals sometime soon!

We can play in the sea, have barbecues,
set fireworks, sleep!
The full summer package!
Off we go!

We're headed to the Kamihama
Community Pool today.

Rena's gonna try out the water slide,
but I think...I'm gonna pass.

Wow!
Everyone showed up in such cute swimsuits!
Nice, everybody looks amazin'!

I see a few familiar faces, too.
I better go say hello!
That noise...
I knew it! There's a wind chime stall!

Bet you didn't expect me to be
into wind chimes!

The designs are so pretty,
and the sound is so soothin’...
S-sooo cute!
Um, I mean, uh!

That pegasus swim float is just,
kinda adorable...
It's fine, it's not like it suits me!

*Sigh*
That rain really came outta nowhere.
Nowhere to stand under for cover, either...
Momoko's bad timing strikes again!
Want some ice cream?

Seriously, Rena and Kaede were wiped
from the heat so I went to get 'em some.
See how many I got? Pick your fave!

Wonder if the Coordinator's
ever been to the ocean.

She seems like the type who prefers
to stay inside, so I guess not?
We should invite her out next time!

Kaede let me have one of the watermelons
she grew at home.
It was SO tasty!

It was huge, but my brothers
demolished it in seconds...

I talked to Rena about goin' to an idol show,
and she's gonna book us tickets and a room.
Ha ha ha...

I'm bad at plannin' nitty gritty stuff
like that...
Swimsuits show off your figure, ya know?

I don't usually care about that stuff,
but swimsuits are different...

Rena laughed and said
I was bein' weirdly girly.
I made up my mind about somethin' today!

Me, Rena, and Kaede are gonna take a
group shot in our swimsuits!
It'll make a good summer memento for us!
